LanguageData.Apparel_LightArmor.label: light armor
LanguageData.Apparel_LightArmor.description: Standard issue body armor within the Ariadna force.
LanguageData.Apparel_Telnyashka.label: telnyashka
LanguageData.Apparel_Telnyashka.description: White undershirt horizontally striped in various colors, the Ariadnan telnyashka is an iconic uniform garment worn by the Tartary Army Corps.
LanguageData.Apparel_ArmyFatigue.label: army fatigue
LanguageData.Apparel_ArmyFatigue.description: The official uniform of Tartary Army Corps(TAK).
LanguageData.Apparel_Cherkesska.label: cherkesska
LanguageData.Apparel_Cherkesska.description: Worn by the legendary "Veteran kazaks" regiment, this teseum plated armor is a one of most advanced protective equipment in Ariadna.
